summary: WHEN A LEFT TURN WAS MADE, AND CONSUMER STRAIGHTENED THE WHEEL,  THE VEHICLE CONTINUED TO TURN TO THE LEFT.  *JB  THE VEHICLE CONSTANTLY WANDERED FROM SIDE TO SIDE, CHANGED LANES WITHOUT TURNING THE STEERING WHEEL, AND WORSENED WHEN TRAVELING FARTHER IN DISTANCE.  THE DEALER THOUGHT IT WAS A TIRE PROBLEM, BUT THE PROBLEM CONTINUED.  AFTER NUMEROUS ATTEMPTS TO REPAIR THE WANDERING, THE PROBLEM CONTINUED, AND AN EXPERIENCED TECHNICIAN STATED THAT THE STEERING WAS THE PROBLEM.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED TO RECIEVE THEIR MONEY BACK FOR THE VEHICLE.  SCC
